name: Galatrick - Ricochet Sector
description:
Galatrick is a hyper fast deep space bullet hell arcade game. You control the Ricochet Sector, a prototype ship armed with six orbiting wrecking balls, and are tasked with fending off endless waves of enemies to prove your ship's worth. How far can you get?

Controls: Use the arrow keys to move, and press Z to boost.

Made in one week for the 2020 Bit Project Gameathon

https://www.bitproject.org/
